description:
Franchouchou`s REVENGE hits a major roadblock as all of Saga is struck by a cataclysmic storm that leaves it`s citizens stranded, without power, and offline. But when the spirits of the living hit their nadir, it may just be the undead who give everyone hope.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All It Takes Is for You to Be There Saga
Tatoeba Kimi ga Iru dake de Saga
たとえば君がいるだけで SAGA
